thread.title: Here’s A Special Breed of Redskins Caller to Brighten Your Day
thread.title_full: Here’s A Special Breed of Redskins Caller to Brighten Your Day

title: Here’s A Special Breed of Redskins Caller to Brighten Your Day
text:
Here’s A Special Breed of Redskins Caller to Brighten Your Day January 3, 2017 6:19 PM By Chris Lingebach (Photo by Patrick Smith/Getty Images) 
WASHINGTON — Redskins callers come in many forms, but Bob in Haymarket may be my favorite. 
To be quite honest, it’s better to go into this one blind, so I won’t bore you with a contrived explanation setting up an audio clip you’re gonna end up listening to and forming your own opinion about anyway. 
Thank you, Bob in Haymarket, for making my day (hat/tip Chad Dukes ): 
Follow @ChrisLingebach and @1067TheFan on Twitter. Chris Lingebach Chris Lingebach is the head writer for TheFanDC.com. He hosts 'The Download' Saturdays from 7:30 a.m. to 8 a.m. on 106.7 The Fan. Email story ideas to him: blueshorts1067@gmail.com. Follow him on Twitter: @ChrisLingebach.
